page.title: 06HORTICULTURE
page.content: There aren't many industries on Mendip, one of them is F.A.Smith Horticultural Works which lies in Green Ore (578,502) and produces soils and composts. The company employs seventeen people, some to work in an office, others to work in a yard. They sell soils for growers and for sports field use, cricket wickets, bowling greens, golf courses, football pitches, rugby grounds and tennis courts including Wimbledon. They supply soil and compost to all parts of the country. The plant includes five delivery lorries, five tractors and three loading shovels. There is also specialised machinery for shredding, sterilising, mixing, sifting and bagging soil.The two large sheds on site are used for mixing the soils and composts and storing them.{
